definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: midst (NH id., also denom. [[תִּוֵּוךְ]]; √ unknown; not apparently in cognate languages);—abs. [[תָּ֫וֶךְ]] Ge 15:10 +; cstr. [[תּוֹךְ]] Ge 1:6 +; [[תּוֹכִי]], [[תּוֹכוֹ]], etc., 2 fs. [[תּוֹכֵּ֫כִי]] † Ps 116:19, Ps 135:9, [[תּוֹכׂה]] † Ez Eze 48:15, Eze 48:21, [[תּוֹכֲכֶם]] Ge 23:9 +, [[תּוֹכָ֫הְנׇה]] † Ez Eze 16:53 (Ges:§ 91 f);—midst, whether of a space or place, a number of people or things, or of a linE: abs. † Ju Jdg 16:29 [[עַמּוּדֵי הַתָּוֶךְ]] = the middle columns, Je 39:3 ´[[שַׁעַר הַתּ]]:, [[בַּתָּוֶךְ]] Ge 15:10 [[וַיְבַתֵּר]] ´[[אׂתָם בַּתּ]]:, Nu 35:5 [[וְהָעִיר בַּתָּוֶךְ]], Jos 8:22, Ju Jdg 15:4, Is 66:17 [[אַחַר אֶחָד בַּתָּוֶךְ]]; cstr. 1Ki 8:54 [[קִדַּשׁ הַמֶּלֶךְ אֶת־]] [[תּוֹךְ הֶחָחֵר]], Ez Eze 15:4 [[וְתוֹכוֹ נׇחָר]]; usu. c. prep., as [[בְּ]] (oft. = an emph. in, in the very heart and midst of), Ge 1:6 [[בְּתוֹךְ הַמַּיִם]], Ge 2:9 [[הַגָּן]] ´[[בְּת]]:, Ge 9:21 [[אָהֳהֽ]] ´[[בְּת]]:, Ge 18:24 [[הָעִיר]] ´[[בְּת]]:, Ge 37:7 [[הַשָּׁדֶה]] ´[[בְּת]]:, Ex 11:4 [[אני יוחא]] [[מחרים]] ´[[בת]]:, Ex 39:3, Jos 8:9 [[הָעָם]] ´[[בְּת]]:, Ju Jdg 7:16 [[הַכַּ דִּים]] ´[[בת]]:, 1Ki 3:20 [[הַלַּיְלָה]] ´[[בְּת]]:; [[בְּתוֹכָהּ]] (of land or city) Nu 13:32, Is 7:6, etc.; in Ez [[בְּתוֹכֵךְ]], [[בְּתוֹכָהּ]], etc., of sins donE, or judgment to be wrought, in the very midst of Jerusalem, Ez Eze 5:8, Eze 5:10, Eze 9:4, Eze 22:3, Eze 22:7, Eze 22:9, Eze 22:13 +; [[מֵעַי]] ´[[בְּת]]: Ps 22:15, Ps 40:9 [[מֵעָ֫י]] ´[[תּוֹרָֽתְךָ בְּת]]:, [[לִבִּי]] ´[[בְּת]]: v:Ps 40:11, cf. Pr 4:21; after verbs of motion, = into Ex 14:27, 1Sa 9:14, = through Ex 14:29, Nu 33:8, Ez Eze 9:4, Ne 9:11; of a number of persons = among (not nEcess. of the actual middle), Ge 40:20 [[עֲבָדָיו]] ´[[בְּת]]:, [[בְּתוֹכְנוּ]] Ge 23:6, [[בְּתוֹכָם]] 1Sa 10:10, Job 1:6, etc., [[הַגׇּר בְּתוֹכֲכֶם]] Le 17:8, Le 17:10, Le 17:13 +; = between (of things arranged by twos) Ex 39:25 in P oft. (12 t.) of the divinE presence, or dwelling, in the midst of Isr., Ex 25:8, Ex 29:45, Ex 29:46, Le 15:31, Le 16:16 + (Carpenter:Hex. i. 209, ed. 2, 410; JED in such cases have alw. [[קֶרֶב]]), so Ez Eze 37:26, Eze 37:28, Eze 43:7, Eze 43:9, cf. Hag 2:5; [[מִן]], as Ge 19:29 [[מִתּוֹךְ הַהֲפֵכָה]], Ex 3:2 ´[[מִתּ]]: [[הַסְּנֶה]], Ex 33:11 [[הָאׂהֶל]] ´[[לאׂ יׇמִישׁ מִתּ]]:, De 4:12 + [[הָאֵשׁ]] ´[[מִתּ]]:, 1Sa 15:6 [[עֲמָלֵק]] ´[[רְדוּ מִתּ]]:; = from among, as to take, separate, etc., [[מִתּוֹכָם]], [[הָעָם]] ´[[מִתּ]]:, etc., Ex 7:5, Ex 28:1, Nu 3:12, Nu 4:2, Nu 4:18, Nu 16:21, Nu 16:33, Nu 17:10, Nu 19:20 (all P) +; [[אֶל]], as Ex 14:23 [[אֶלאתּוֹךְ הַיׇּם]]…[[ויבאו]]:, Le 11:33, Nu 17:12 [[וַיׇּרָץ]] [[הַקָּהָל]] ´[[אֶלאתּ]]:, Nu 19:6, De 21:12 [[בֵּיתֶ֫ךָ]] ´[[וַהֲבֵאתָהּ אֶלאתּ]]:, De 22:2, De 23:11, 2Sa 3:27, 2Sa 4:6, Je 21:4 +; [[מֵעַל]] † Ez Eze 11:23.—[[תוך]] is used by most writers, occurring c. 8–10 times in many books, but is esp. frequent in P (c. 106 t,) and Ez (116 t.). Syn. [[קֶרֶב]], q.v.
